name: Mycelium (Not Tom, 0rang, alexge50)
description:
EPILESPY AND NAUSEA WARNING

Mycelia:

  • "The connected mass of interwoven 'filamentous hyphae' of a fungus, often submerged in soil or organic matter"
  • Collect 9 mushrooms from around the map to plant in the centre and reconnect the mycelium network!

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Mouse move - Camera

R - Return to main menu

Walk into mushrooms to collect them, and plant them in the green marker at spawn.  Your speed increases as you plant mushrooms, some can only be accessed with high enough speed

(Runs better in download compared to webplayer)
